db:abstract.db:para: The Qt Spatial Audio module provides APIs for modeling sound source and their surrounds in 3D space.

db:article.db:para: Qt Spatial Audio is an add-on module that provides a rich set of QML types and C++ classes to implement sound fields in 3D space. It contains an easy to use API for positing a listener in space, adding localized sound sources around the listener and emulating virtual rooms with reverb and reflections.

db:section.db:title: Getting started
db:section.db:para: If you are new to Qt Spatial Audio, the QML types can be imported into an application using the following statement in your .qml file.
To link against the C++ libraries, add the following to your project's CMakeLists.txt file. Substitute my_project with the name of your project.
db:section.db:programlisting: find_package(Qt6 REQUIRED COMPONENTS SpatialAudio) target_link_libraries(my_project PRIVATE Qt6::SpatialAudio)
